dashboardMetadata.name: ðŸ”Ž Book Travel Journey Revenue and Conversion Compare

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Lost Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not ((useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf"))

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Risk Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and (userExperienceScore ="TOLERATED" or userExperienceScore ="FRUSTRATED" or userExperienceScore ="UNDEFINED")

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="SATISFIED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="TOLERATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") and not (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="SATISFIED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") and not (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="TOLERATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") and not (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "Duration" from useraction where useraction.application="EasyTravel"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(useraction.errorCount) as "Errors" from useraction where useraction.application="EasyTravel"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login"

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="SATISFIED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Lost Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and not useraction.name="click on login"

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Risk Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and (userExperienceScore ="TOLERATED" or userExperienceScore ="FRUSTRATED" or userExperienceScore ="UNDEFINED")

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Conversions" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="TOLERATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and not useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="TOLERATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "Duration" from useraction where useraction.application="EasyTravel"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and useraction.name="click on login" and newUser IS true

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and not useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: DTAQL
tiles.query: select count(usersessionid) as "Abandons" from usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and not useraction.name="click on login" and userExperienceScore="SATISFIED" and usersession.doubleProperties.revenue>0

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(useraction.errorCount) as "Errors" from useraction where useraction.application="EasyTravel"

tiles.name: EasyTravel Book Travel Journey Last 2 hours
User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Lost Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel" and useraction.name="click on login" and useraction.name="click on login" and newUser IS true

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Lost Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")
